Positive_Review: the best location in Vienna beautiful hotel excellent services awesome breakfast everything was in a walking distance because of the hotel our trip to vienna was awesome

Negative_Review: 1 Costly for small room 2 I did not like that when we arrived and during check in I paid for the breakfast for the two nights In the morning I was sick and did not go for the breakfast My husband went alone but he informed the staff that I am sick and can t eat breakfast and requested for yoghurt and tea to the room when we were checking out I found that they have charged the breakfast for two persons and also the room service We explained to them and tried to request them to consider either one even if they charge the breakfast which was expensive But they said breakfast is nonrefundable and they claimed that they only charged the delivery for the room service Again don t know why it is not a big deal for this small case but they could manage it better so we an appraise and give good comment about the hotel
Positive_Review: Location
Excellent hotel Very good and polite staff Room was very comfortable and quite Everything was superb I will come back here for sure Dear hotel staff thank you again for your hospitality

Negative_Review: The opening hours on the spa could be a bit longer
Positive_Review: Steigenberg Hotel Herrenhof is a beautiful hotel with an excellent location just a few minutes walk away from Hofburg Palace and Stephansplatz The U bahn station Herrenhof was just around the corner which was very convenient

We arrived really late at night and despite the hour our room was upgraded the little perks in the room made our so much desired rest a great experience Beautiful room beautiful views Everything was great
Food excellent good bar area with the staff being very friendly The hotel is in a great location for sightseeing in Vienna Overall a very good trip in a good hotel
Very good breakfast Mini bar contents were complimentary for the stay Room comfortable and felt at home Close to local mini market Close to many attractions Staff helpful and supportive

Negative_Review: I mistakenly booked the room rate without breakfast and was happy to receive an email prior to our arrival giving me the option to add breakfast for 29 person room Not cheap but we wanted to enjoy their breakfast buffet so I booked the upgrade When we checked in I found out that one can add breakfast for 20 room nigh For a family of 4 that s a 36 difference per might This was an unpleasant and frustrating experience since the booking through booking com could not be undone The email one receives offering upgrades makes it look as if it came from Steigenberger directly when in fact it comes from booking com That s almost deceiving Lesson learned on this trip booking com rates are almost always worse than booking directly with the hotel Another issue we encountered not only but also at the Steigenberger although rooms with twin beds were specifically offered and one reason why we decided to book a certain hotel over another that wouldn t offer seperate twin beds we never got the separate beds we requested but ended up with one king or queen I have a feeling that this would also be handled better if done directly with the hotel Last but not least our room was on the small side and almost a bit claustrophobic Our kids had a slightly larger room which seemed more airy and comfortable
Positive_Review: Excellent location excellent staff very nice and rich breakfast buffet Quiet rooms

The staff are very friendly and helpful They are willing to go the extra mile to help The hotel location is super convenient It is close to all the important visiting sites and museums Will definitely stay again if I come back to Vienna

Negative_Review: The price of the breakfast was high 29 euro for an average eater and the daily parking cost was high in my opinion 40 euro There was a park house close there people may check the costs or look for a parking place before their travel
Positive_Review: The location was good and the room was clean The breakfast was various and the network was strong enough we were at the 2 floor
Very good service friendly and professional staff great location comfortable beds superb rooms Fresh food at breakfast Will recommend the hotel to my friends business partners Excellent experience

Negative_Review: As we found the breakfast too pricey we decided to go to a restaurant nearby
Positive_Review: Great location Only a few steps from the underground station Herrengasse in heart of Vienna Very friendly and helpful staff Many restaurants and shops are close by

We arrived earlier than the check in time but were given a room at once which was a help The room was nicely furnished and clean with a comfortable bed The breakfast was excellent with everything you could want everything regularly replenished so no hanging around for foods that had run out and the cakes bread and pastries were very fresh Excellent scrambled eggs The waiting staff were helpful and attentive We found all the hotel staff restaurant bar and reception to be very friendly and helpful A special mention to Andreas on reception who was utterly charming friendly and efficient The hotel had a very pleasant atmosphere which was down to the staff and probably because the guests didn t have anything to complain about

Negative_Review: Expensive breakfast didn t feel like 5 hotel not a good value for money
Positive_Review: The location was perfect close to everything Big room nice bar free WiFi
The location was wonderful close to everything Our room was lively and big with high ceilings and big windows The staff were extremely helpful and went out of their way to make us comfortable

Negative_Review: Very crowded at peak times in the breakfast room literally not room to move so make sure that you go early for breakfast then it is very relaxing and gives time to explore the extensive buffet
Positive_Review: The rooms were very nice and generous in size and well appointed Fantastic location for exploring Vienna Great welcome from the reception staff

Negative_Review: Bed was a bit hard for us
Positive_Review: Location was excellent being close to the city centre and main attractions Buffet breakfast was very good with lots of healthy options too Staff friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: Needed more hanging space in bathroom for towels and extra shelf space for toiletries e g hair brushes etc Also needed more hangers in wardrobe to hang clothes
Positive_Review: Room was very nice and comfortable
Location was perfect right next to a metro station It was also right next to a famous coffee shop by Central Cafe which was amazing Staff was friendly and accommodating

Negative_Review: The bed wasn t comfortable as there two mattresses were moved together to make a king size bed We wanted to order cheese board after 11pm and it wasn t available as the kitchen was closed otherwise everything was excellent
Positive_Review: The hotel was beautiful very central location staff was veryfriendly and helpful

Negative_Review: Breakfast price was a little steep 20 29 euro for 1 person and we didn t use that services
Positive_Review: As Vienna touristic center is small the hotel is in the dead center with a U bahn station 30 seconds away to get to the farther attractions or the city airport train Was one of the most comfortable beds we slept on and the room was super clean We also received 1 complementary use of the mini bar which was refreshing after a longs day walk The staff was always willing to help and took their time to assist and answer all the questions All in all the stay was one of our best I would have gladly stayed a few more nights

Negative_Review: Wifi was slow and not so secure Our single experience with the restaurant was lackluster but there are several quite nice restaurants within a 1 block radius
Positive_Review: Staff were unfailingly knowledgeable helpful professional and just cheery Wonderful location just steps from the underground Metro and in easy walking distance to main sights This hotel has a good mix of business and leisure travelers and they are thus fully equipped to handle the needs of both Smart comfortable appointments in the room with a number of little touches that made us feel appreciated and welcome including fresh bottled water and chocolates each day

Negative_Review: Waiting 20 minutes in the foyer for my room to be cleaned at 15 45 pm on one occasionWaiting for 20 minutes at the outside sitting area for a drink as the staff had to come from the inside bar and they were quote very busy Although it seems petty horrible little sticks to stir your coffee or take out tea bags in the room
Positive_Review: The location of the property the reception staff and the comfort The general feel of the hotel

Negative_Review: Valet Parking was expensive compared to other hotels in Vienna centre Got a room under the roof in the attic with a very small window and no view
Positive_Review: Great location friendly staff

Negative_Review: Bed a little uncomfortable and air conditioning was quite poor The room was very warm which made it difficult to sleep
Positive_Review: Rooms nice and spacious staff attentive and friendly

The suite was spacious and comfortable and had a dining area which enabled us to order breakfast in the room for a daily rate of 15 euros The selection available for breakfast was extensive including eggs omelettes bacon mushrooms cereal yoghurts fresh fruit croissants and more Breakfast times were also extended of a weekend which is great if you like a lie in The staff were very professional and friendly a credit to the hotel The location was quite central and within walking distance of the museum quarter State Opera and shopping areas A lovely hotel 10 out of 10 highly recommended

From arrival to checkout the customer service and friendliness was absolutely superb Bed was very comfortable room and view was so nice Rented 2 adjoining rooms Valet parking was nice Restaurants museums shopping all close within short walk Wonderful hotel experience

Negative_Review: We loved the hotel Nothing we didn t like
Positive_Review: The location was excellent Short walk to major sites While we could have taken the train the transfer to the metro from the airport we used viennadriver com for a few euros more It was nice to get to the hotel quickly after a long flight Room was ready for us Breakfast is outstanding Rooms very comfortable Staff was excellent

Negative_Review: Room was quite small and we had power issues Shower in bathtub Room was very dry too much air conditioned
Positive_Review: Location is perfect near to subway station and very close to Cafe Central

Negative_Review: The room decor and build although new and modern had a cheap feeling to it
Positive_Review: The hotel is new modern and very clean Excellent location Very helpful staff Excellent hot breakfast with lots of choices

Negative_Review: The staff could be more cheerful warm and caring They really behave like robots straight to the text they must say and not what a normal human being would tell in the same situation Some sockets in the room did not work it was too cold during the night and the temperature could no be increased There are some stains on the chairs the housekeeping went just while i was having breakfast and i spent some time convincing them the return later The door on my last day refused to open due to the fact they probably already checked me out but it was 9 45 am and i did not asked to check me out So i had to spend around 15 min going to the basement and back to the room each time with a new key that did not work
Positive_Review: The breakfast is exceptional very good with fresh juices lots of warm food fruits and cheses The location is very close to the butique streets and just next to a metro station The streets are quit There is a free water in the room every day and nice chokolates The rooms are quite spacious and look nice

The hotel is welcoming and warm staff are attentive Liked the large spacious bar lounge Bedroom was spacious and comfortable Very impressed by one member of the reception staff who went out of his way to assist with a change of room

Negative_Review: The streets around the hotel are fairly quiet but the room had very little in terms of sound insulation and Vienna like any city can be noisy even early in the morning
Positive_Review: Mainstream 5 star hotel perfectly situated in the very heart of Vienna a few minutes walk from the Hofburg Palace the Graben shopping street and St Stephen s Cathedral It is in an old good looking building but at some point in the past 15 or so years was the subject of an aesthetically questionable refurbishment It is however truly impeccably clean and maintained to an as new level that is not easy to come by in lesser hotels The deluxe room was of fair size also impeccably cleaned and maintained and fairly well equipped for a business class hotel We paid a little extra for a corner room with more windows and I felt like it was also a little bigger than other rooms on our floor It was one of the very few to have a balcony which was a nice touch no space to sit but pleasangt to walk out in the morning The minibar was adequate water coke and beer and free throughout the stay Nespresso is provided but oddly not a kettle We did not try the breakfast but did use the spa gym sauna steam bath and relaxation area which is nice and very clean if often a little crowded
Nice notel in a great location The executive room is big the hotel staff is very helpful and kind I didn t like that the sheets and towels weren t changed every day pretty disappointing for a 5 hotel

Negative_Review: Neck support pillow not available first night when requested in the morning due to there not being enough in the hotel
Positive_Review: Friendly staff Great facilities Always clean Modern decor Lovely breakfasts Perfect location for Vienna
The pillows and beds were really comfortable The free mini bar refreshed daily was a lovely surprise The breakfast croissants were so fresh and tasty

Negative_Review: The dear as poison parkingwhile indicated on arrival it was 40 for the two days this was actually per night while I accept it would be higher than even the most expensive we had paid elsewhere this was more than double anywhere else which left my opinion of this property tainted Not happy jane and very little empathy was shown for the confusion
Positive_Review: High end property with live music in the bar be sure to have the bar man make you a nice cocktail while enjoying the live music

Negative_Review: Would have preferred a separate shower No pool Breakfast expensive
Positive_Review: Excellent location right next to tube station and walking distance to most central venues Not cheap but worth the money Spacious room worth the 17 upgrade option Free minibar Very good breakfast though expensive 29
Location is perfect walking distance to the trains and to the city center Staff at the front desk are really professional smiling helpful and welcoming The room is very good big clean and warm
Perfect location within a short walk from almost all main attractions Staff were extremely nice and helpful and the room was clean comfortable and has enough space

Negative_Review: Cleaning we have noticed that it was not even vacuum cleaned Why not to have a proper minibar selection for Superior Room
Positive_Review: Breakfast was very good with excellent choice for every taste Staff at reception and in the restaurant were attentive and friendly Excellent location sights and public transport

Negative_Review: Our room was not maked up at one of the days of our staying despite we were out since morning till evening and placed a table please make up the room At the day of our departure a chambermaid wanted to make up the room before our leaving it was very strange
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: At 5 a m the heating the room started I could not turn it off It was a lot of noise and I could not get back to sleep again Without that my night would have been perfect
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: First of all this is a 5 star hotel Being so I am expecting a service typical for that category Staff was not at the expected level breakfast as well This hotel is mainly for congress and meetings much less for couples Service is absolutely anonymous Saying that I would not rate it as a 5 star hotels indeed to my eyes this is a very good 4 hotel but definitely not a 5 one
Positive_Review: Excellent position room was big very clean and well furnished

Negative_Review: Breakfast area is somewhat tight It is strange but they do not serve sekt or any other sparkling for breakfast whereas it is almost a part of signature lifestyle of Vienna
Positive_Review: The hotel offers nice atmosphere and great location for those who want enjoy Vienna sparkling lifestyle Kohlmarkt with its shopping is just a few steps away major tourist attractions like Hofburg Albertina Opera are a few minutes away U bahn station is around the corner Rooms are spacious and sunny clean with incredibly comfortable beds

Negative_Review: This is not a 5 star hotel anymore We already stayed there a couple of times But this stay did not meet our expectations Breakfast is mediocre but allright We wanted a nice and relaxing Sunday brunch until 12 which is a bonus But at 10 30 they in particular a busy manager started taking away tables and seats in one of the two rooms for a lunch buffet until it was empty They only waited that we would finally leave after having been there for 15 minutes After having changed the room we noted that also the nice tea bar was gone and had been replaced by a champagne bar for the lunch The small spa is not very clean Wet towels left by guests everywhere dirty glasses empty soap dispensers no tea water mould in the steam room broken fittings After two days we did not use the spa anymore The first days the bar was used for a convention and rearranged with additional functional furniture it came along with a heavy smell of food On one evening it was even closed for some time On the last day the room service came late but the breakfast was abbondant Too many inconveniences and negative points for 5 stars and the room price of more than 200 Euro without breakfast which is 29 It is a pity but we have to look elsewhere
Positive_Review: Very good location Friendly staff at the reception

Great location to walk around the city Everything is in walking distance so We were able to see a lots though it was cold outside Stuff was very friendly and helped us a lot with spots where we want to go Room is very clean and comfortable

Negative_Review: Dust in the room wrote my name in the dust on the shelf in the bathroom was still there 4 days later Final night it was properly cleaned
Positive_Review: Excellent breakfast

Negative_Review: Breakfasts at the hotel are quite expensive since there were 4 of us but there are a lots of places near by where you can find cheaper breakfast options
Positive_Review: Everything was great
Loved this hotel The location was fantastic Minutes walk from the Hofburg the town hall Christmas market and cafe central Plenty dining options around it too

Negative_Review: The spa was small not the best Breakfast very expensive but we went for continental breakfast in the bar which was more reasonable and we had plenty
Positive_Review: Very clean and brilliant location Pillows and beds very comfortable and room very quite due to double windows The staff were very professional I would definitely stay again

Negative_Review: I was really disappointed with the service especially for the price To be honest I have no idea how it was a 5 star hotel Felt like a 3 or lower as far as service goes We asked in our booking request for a feather free room due to allergies This did not happen Okay fine We then asked 4 additional times for the bedding to be swapped out in a 5 night stay It didn t happen until after 10pm on our last night We also ran out of tissues on the morning of day 2 They were not replaced during any of the the room cleanings so we had to ask for them to be replaced They still never were They never asked us how our stay was or was going All of this would be fine for a 4 star or 3 star or below but unacceptable for a 5 star of this pricing Honestly don t waste your money You won t get the experience you re looking for
Positive_Review: Location was good Room was of a decent size Breakfast buffet was decent

Negative_Review: first room we received had 2 mattresses and as we booked one queen size bed we had to move to another room which had one bed The second room s shower head was leaking
Positive_Review: Staff location clean room size room service

Negative_Review: We were very happy with everything We didn t include breakfast in our option here nor did we eat here so that part is difficult to assess
Positive_Review: The room was very spacious and comfortable and very quiet It was in a prime location close to a railway station and all major tourist attractions The bar was relaxing and a good place to unwind and regroup after a day out and before or after dinner
Location clean quiet rooms and the very friendly polite staff especially the young lady receptionist and Richard the concierge But everyone else was very kind as well

Negative_Review: night staff was really root its a very expensive hotel and we expected more friendly atmosphere very pure christmas decoration since we were there for christmas holidays very dissapointed cause vienna is famous about christmas spirit not even music in public areas
Positive_Review: excellent location big rooms and also big bathroom breakfast was really excellent with a big variety of food

Negative_Review: I had booked more than a month in advance and paid upfront for 2 superior rooms via booking com When we arrived at 12 pm I was told the rooms were not ready and they would call me when ready with the guaranteed room check in at 3 pm So we went out and had lunch but since I was not feeling great and it was raining I came back and sat at the lobby We finally got the rooms at 3 pm not a minute earlier which was disappointing as many other guests were getting their rooms earlier at check in I was told that my booking category was lower than theirs Overall this was disappointing as I requested even one out of our two rooms if ready but was not given any flexibility I travel at least twice a month internationally and this was a very unusual experience which left a bad taste in my mouth Frankly it was clear that they waited till the 3 pm deadline which could have been managed better
Positive_Review: Service was good rooms were good and the location is excellent If you want a hotel near the sights and shopping then this is it

Negative_Review: The restaurant was not the best Really had to venture out for a great dining experience
Positive_Review: The staff who went out of their way to organise site seeing and location of activities
Location quietness food and range of eatery facilities staff lounge bathroom layout and appliances solidness of the building and quality of construction

Negative_Review: We were misinformed about the holding deposit and they actually take more money than the cost of your stay I am putting this first issue down to the language barrier of the first lady we dealt with The manager was quick to rectified this situation so cannot fault anything else at all
Positive_Review: Amazing hotel staff very friendly location is excellent as it is in the centre of everything We went for the Christmas markets and the location as said above was ideal I got engaged on my trip so Vienna is a very special place for me

Negative_Review: The rooms need freshening up Breakfast was good but overpriced
Positive_Review: Excellent location and within walking distance of many areas of interest The hotel itself was good and the rooms comfortable

Negative_Review: Below the bathroom mirror in all the rooms we have stayed in there is no ledge a very minor problem so is the glass of the washroom which is a bit short
Positive_Review: Staff Incredibly nice and helpful Breakfast second to NONE Rooms comfortable and clean Location cannot be better

Everything was perfect The staff were wonderful everyone we encountered The room was very spacious and clean and the wifi worked at all times The shower was great Breakfast was amazing It had anything you can imagine I also noticed people having their eggs made to order although we were happy with the huge selection available The location couldn t have been any better Staying here was a great experience Thank you all

It was the birthday surprise for my wife The stuff was very friendly an every wish of us was getting realized The birthday cake on breakfast was the topping of this Grand stay at the steigenberger Vienna We will come back really

Negative_Review: The bed was a little hard We had classic massage was ok but a little sloppy
Positive_Review: Fantastic room fantastic view fantastic staff fantastic breakfast fantastic location

Negative_Review: you have many TV channels but anyone not in Czech or Slovak language
Positive_Review: excellent breakfast pleasant staff beautiful position in centre of Vienna City

Negative_Review: The shower design was somewhat uncomfortable as it is combined with the bath tub which makes taller people stand in the already bend part of the tub In addition there was construction work right in front of the hotel which made the mornings rather loud Yet this is a temporary issue
Positive_Review: This is a very decent hotel right in the center of town It is basically what you pay for but neither extraordinarily cheap or a secret tip Especially considering other decent hotels in the vicinity the undiscounted price seems just a little to high

Negative_Review: Superior queen sized room was small the width was only a little longer than the bed Only one arm chair although it s a double room but probably wasn t room for a second one Room faced the inner courtyard which we thought would mean it was quiet but there was a private party in the bar one night that was very loud indeed and disturbed us even though we were on the fifth floor And although the party was meant to be in the bar it spilled out into the lobby so we had to push through to enter the hotel and get to the lift
Positive_Review: Very comfortable bed and rooms well equipped Excellent central location

Negative_Review: The first morning the entire bathroom flooded and water poured into the bedroom They changed the room that evening but it seemed as if it was a regular occurrence Can t believe they would build a walk in shower without a door
Positive_Review: The location is excellent close to all attractions

Negative_Review: Difficult to find with all the construction in the city for a foriegner The expense to park the car at the hotel Perhaps you could tell patrons of their other options
Positive_Review: Buffet was the best

Negative_Review: Was told breakfast was included when checking in But upon checkout was told it was not and was charged 25 euro per person per breakfast Would have eaten elsewhere for much cheaper had I known
Positive_Review: Location and ease of getting around Venice was great Rooms were very comfortable and clean

Negative_Review: It s really high level I really wonder what could have been better Ah they had no alcohol in the minibar
Positive_Review: Location good room breakfast all excellent

Negative_Review: The staff claimed they received all information from booking com except for the bed preference but it s hard to believe that my confirmation e mail and the hotel s email from booking com were different
Positive_Review: The location is great the bed is comfortable and due to double windows you don t hear any noise from the street The restaurant in the hotel serves godd food

The location is perfect within walking distance of all the top sights Make sure you stop by the iconic Cafe Central turn right out of the hotel We especially appreciated the assistance of the charming Dave who greeted us on arrival and helped with everything Visit the little known Capuchin Kaiser Crypt for an alternative Viennese experience one place Dave didn t know
The location was excellent and the hotel staff most friendly helpful Our room was very comfortable and quite We were very satisfied with our stay there

The location is perfect in the center of Vienna all interesting places and the Opera are in a short walking distance as well as karntner street There are too many restaurants and cafes around the hotel

Negative_Review: Lack of early check in capability
Positive_Review: The location the decor chocolate left every night fresh oranges squeezed with an old fashioned juice press at the bar a good quality breakfast buffet with lots of variety friendly staff and a spacious room

Negative_Review: TV remote control malfunctioned everyday We called house keeping but it constantly malfunctioner
Positive_Review: Location Is fantastic Great staff efficient friendlly really to help Bed is very confortable bathroom facilities excellent generous size room

Negative_Review: Bottle opener for mini bar was difficult to use and my sister hurt herself using it Recommend replacing with better design
Positive_Review: Amazing location with easy access to everywhere Having Cafe Central 20 feet away was great

Negative_Review: There was road works outside our hotel but this did not inconvenience us
Positive_Review: The hotel was very clean The room was spacious quiet All the staff were very polite efficient The breakfasts were very good varied The hotel was located within walking distances to the shops restaurants and tourist sites that we wanted to go to We would definitely be returning to this hotel in the not too distant future

Excellent location near variety of cafes resturants and amazing shopping experience with luxury brands famous stores in the area Demel caf is only 3 minutes walk Clean hotel I will definitely stay in it in my next visit to Vienna

Negative_Review: Didn t like two beds joined together as a double together with two separate duvets
Positive_Review: fab location great staff very quiet and peaceful area but so central Very clean Stylish bedroom great bathroom lots of towels All excellent quality

Negative_Review: Housekeeping was inefficient Coffee cups were not cleaned pods were not replaced Staff was rude and walked into the room speaking loudly and arguing amongst themselves
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: we took 2 rooms different floors and theres strange smell in the corridors Noisy noisy place because of the constructions outside the hotel 3 when i reached the room there was no water from 11 untel 5am
Positive_Review: location is good and rooms are species and perfect

Negative_Review: The room smelled damp or like it had been smoked in The bed wasn t comfortable and even though I put the do not disturb sign on the door they came in anyway They never restocked the mini bar The hotel staff wasn t very friendly even though it is not inexpensive to stay there They didn t even ask how my stay was when I departed
Positive_Review: The location was hard to fine but easy access to everything The staff was ok

Negative_Review: The water was boiling in the showers even when I turned the knob to cold
Positive_Review: Very close to the metro and in the heart of the city The staff were very nice and helpful

Negative_Review: Breakfast was quite expensive we didn t take it and made our breakfast in nearby cafes
Positive_Review: Great location Almost everywhere in old town is walking distance We stayed at standard room with our 1 year old The room was big enough

Negative_Review: Shame our visit coincided with the uplifting of the road and walking paths The noise was there but you kind of get use to it
Positive_Review: Steigenberger is close to shopping cafes and historical monuments and museums 1 minute to Cafe Central which is a must to visit The rooms are clean and fresh and there is an option to upgrade which I did Nothing is too much for the staff Very friendly
We were upgraded to a premium room for free Excellent location Excellent wifi connection Breakfast was great with many varieties and fresh juices Super clean room

Negative_Review: We asked for toothbrush and it took 40 minutes to receive it
Positive_Review: Nice breakfast Great location Nice bed Smooth checkin amd checkout professional staff in front desk

Negative_Review: Breakfast was in addition to the room price which I don t think for the cost should be Parking was very hard to find and concierge not very helpful Cleaner knocked once and entered the room at 8 45am the day we were checking out which not really acceptable
Positive_Review: Location was great

Negative_Review: I don t know why but the cold water became boiled water in the late evenings and early in the mornings
Positive_Review: Everything was very good i would mention the breakfast was excelent with a wide range of choices The staff was very helpful and efficient

Perfect knowledgable and friendly staff check in check out were a breeze the cleanliness and quality of rooms and hotel areas were 10 10 the breakfast was second to none for choice and availability again with excellent staff Fantastic location we would thoroughly recommend this excellent hotel to anyone
Right in the centre of main shopping district and very close to the metro evert morning went out for breakfast and find many places Had a great time

Negative_Review: No water supply in one night because of broken boiler or breakage of water pipe and no explanation was given until we contacted the receiption
Positive_Review: Very tasty breakfast especially freshly made fruit vegetable mixed juices and omelettes to order Nicely decolated spacious modern room and confortable beds

Negative_Review: I cannot think of anything bad really
Positive_Review: Our room had a tea coffee making facility and drinks in the minibar were complimentary What we drank they replaced them next day Room was spacious clean and elegantly furnished Good location and excellent service Both of us thoroughly enjoyed staying at this hotel

Negative_Review: there was no swimming pool and kids didn t like that
Positive_Review: Friendly staff and speaks English the location is great close to the main points of the city

Negative_Review: I requested connected rooms at time of booking and I communicated with hotel 48 hours before check in as my first priority but the hotel failed to provide full booked is the reason my personal feeling that reception at time of check in was not concern about my request since one employee say if you request before you will get and after looking to her manger she kept silent for few minutes and replayed it is not available but we will give you rooms next each other my understanding from body language that my request was not matter for the hotel for two days I did not feel comfortable since I am traveling with children and the family had to separated
Positive_Review: all I stayed three days and in second day there was some water came down from the roof of my room Hotel replaced my two rooms with two connected suites due to roof damage as complement for last day It was very nice and kind

Negative_Review: I wanted to pay with pin but the international limit on my pincard was just a bit less So I couls only pay half the first day by pinning outside linit 400 euro they made big problems at first about this and wanted a creditcard But my cc has a low limit In the end they accepted a deposit of 500 they wanted 1200 cash first as a deposit for a 900 bill which we did not understand at all and I paid 400 cash the next day It was unpleasant when at first i could not give a deposit
Positive_Review: free minibar great location wonderful beds airconditioning very clean

Negative_Review: Drinks at the hotel bar were slightly pricey
Positive_Review: Location and staff excellent Hotel and rooms big and beautiful Breakfast amazing big selection of fresh juices smoothies

Negative_Review: Pillows like everywhere in Austria are terrible
Positive_Review: Location metro station is adjusted tot the hotel Breakfast was superior with a huge variety of food

Negative_Review: There was street construction going on in the front of the hotel However I did not hear it from my room
Positive_Review: The staff was friendly and accommodating The room was well designed with comfortable bedding

Negative_Review: Neither the Hotel when we called to book an extra night NOR Booking com EVER mentioned that there is major road construction around the hotel therefore there would be NO automobile access IF we knew in advance we would not rent a car that cost 208 just so that we could have them park the car in the garage for 3 days without access and for THIS PRIVILEGE charge us 29 Euros each night that is 90 Euros WITHOUT offering anything in return and a just saying SORRY NOT going there again or use our favorite booking site that is Booking com It is outrageous Jahan Salehi Ph D
Positive_Review: LOCATION CLEANNESS COMFORT
Beautiful hotel with tasteful and elegant decor from the lobby to the bedroom The location was incredible Right around the the corner form the metro and just a few blocks from the cathedral

Negative_Review: There was no twin room prepared on arrival though specifically requested and confirmed as I was travelling with my 85yr old mother Was told I could only change from our very small double bedroom if one was available Breakfast was 20 regardless of individual requirements or people wanting a light start to the day Ordering a taxi is very inefficient as they don t pass on any details to either party so you stand around second guessing the queue
Positive_Review: Was a nice hotel with friendly staff The floor manager was appreciative of my room dilemma but I was still left having to ask 3 times if someone was actually helping me

Negative_Review: We asked for a king bed and got twin beds instead Even though we asked for it the receptionist just didn t care
Positive_Review: The hotel has an excellent location Fluffy pillows Fast wifi Restaurant staff is very thoughtful and attentive

Definitely great location Walking distance to most sites right beside Cafe Central and right beside the underground as well The room itself was clean and so was the bathroom Very comfortable stay Staff was also helpful with recommendations

Negative_Review: There was some construction work just outside the hotel which was a little bit noisy in the morning
Positive_Review: The room was comfortable the breakfast was great all the staff were helpful especially in the concierge area Hofry Micheal who helped us a lot in arranging the tours i would like to send special thanks to him

Negative_Review: We got a free upgrade which was excellent although they said we could have a free mini bar there was not much in it so a bit disappointing
Positive_Review: The air conditioning was very good not noisy so we were able to keep it on through the night

Negative_Review: staff are not friendly mainly a front desk person called Kristina who treats you like you are not really welcome at the hotel main point is that it is a 5 star that should be considered 3 stars for its old carpet messy lobby service at the bar and many atreas of the hotel that does not look like a 5 stars at all
Positive_Review: good location but there are many contradictions about what it is said at booking and what you get when you arrive at the hotel

Negative_Review: Arrived after 10pm given a room that stunk of cigarette smoke after stating No smoking on booking had to carry our own bags Complained and we where moved to a non smoking floor room Not a great start But it improved remarkably
Positive_Review: Great location super comfortable bed Helpful staff

Negative_Review: Inconsistency of staff interaction Some were excellent and very helpful others abrupt Cost of breakfast very excessive yes I know we could have had a cheaper option in the bar The breakfast was good and if cheaper we would have chosen it every day
Positive_Review: Rooms comfortable and hotel in an excellent location

Negative_Review: We booked two rooms one was ready upon arrival however the other took 3 hours If you like privacy don t forget the DO NOT ENTER sign house keeping won t hesitate to open the door without knocking
Positive_Review: On the first night I received a very thoughtful letter which included the prayer times info about halal food prayer mat and compass this thoughtful gesture impressed my whole family Free wifi is excellent Loved the breakfast buffet a wide range of selections loved the friendliness and the willingness to help of the staff Location location location Speedy checkout Overall experience was great this hotel is definitely our number one choice whenever we decide to visit vienna again
Beautiful hotel decor 1st class Bedrooms spacious and beautifully decorated Beds very comfortable Staff very helpful and polite Location excellent nice and quiet though

Negative_Review: Breakfast very expensive but several famous Vienese cafes nearby Had some difficulty regulating the temperature of the air conditioning in my room Construction on the street outside the hotel caused some noise even late at night
Positive_Review: Great location very helpful front desk staff large rooms with high ceilings free mini bar

Negative_Review: When we were having a hard time finding our way back to the hotel walking from the giant farris wheel we called the number from the internet 3 times and never got an answer
Positive_Review: Bathroom was excellent bed and pillows very comfy and very up to date hotel
Staff was really nice and helpful Rooms were big and full of light Location is perfect A welcome change after living in Vienna Le Meridian a few days earlier

Fantastic location excellent courteous and very helpful staff check in and out very smooth On request less than 5 min for taxi Wi Fi no issues rooms to a high standard Knock out breakfast such a choice and staff very helpful and extremely polite Would not hesitate to recommend hotel

Negative_Review: The Breakfast was 29 pp which was expensive We checked out what was available but decided to eat elsewhere
Positive_Review: The staff were courteous helpful and very professional The communal areas of the Hotel were relaxing and comfortable The actual room was big clean and very comfy especially the bed Loved the kettle and tea making facility we visit Vienna once a year and will definitely stay here ageing The location is perfect we managed to walk everywhere without too much difficulty

Negative_Review: Pillows were well below average for comfort Location was great
Positive_Review: Rationing of amenities Why do you do that in a 5 star property However the staff was very good and helpful

Negative_Review: Most of the rooms doesn t have a view but thats ok considering the price
Positive_Review: Very nice staff and very helpful Location was probably the best in Vienna you can walk to almost everywhere and if you are not in the mood for walking the metro is just outside the hotel The rooms are small but very nice and clean and comfortable

Negative_Review: Breakfast costs 29 EUR per person per night which is extremely exaggerated
Positive_Review: Location is just perfect almost every attraction is in walking distance near to Metro station and restaurants

Beautiful old building on outside but thoroughly modern inside Great location in city center Very friendly staff Hotel was not full when I was there and they automatically upgraded me to a junior suite at no extra charge

Negative_Review: It was not a big problem but I couldn t understand why they took nearly 300 euros more than the hotel price for provision
Positive_Review: Perfect location only a few steps to the hofburg palace graben central cafe The staff is very kind and helpful The rooms are clean and well decorated

Negative_Review: welcoming of Kriztina at the reception is like a punch on your face Very unpleasant In general front desk staff is always stressed and not welcoming or willing to help you expept for the menager himself
Positive_Review: localiza o good location

Negative_Review: Not able to get to hotel on arrival because of city centre closed off for festival Drove around for 2 hrs then walked in Would have appreciated warning email from hotel
Positive_Review: Location excellent Central attractions nearby Luxurious Cafe Central in next block with beautiful breakfasts cake

Negative_Review: Unkind receptionist when chek in She had to explain more in detail about room service Refregerator was not filled everyday so that I had to call for water late in the evening
Positive_Review: good location and healthy breakfast
We stayed here for 2 nights the location is very convenient to almost everything The staff were friendly and helpful the room was comfortable and quiet

Negative_Review: The receptionists maybe the worst I have ever seen in my entire life of travelling I did not feel for a second that I was dealing with a 5 star hotel staff
Positive_Review: The location was good

Negative_Review: Nothing in respect of the hotel Some of the local people we encountered were a little offhand and unfriendly despite me being a German speaker Unfortunately that seems par for the course in Austria
Positive_Review: Very friendly staff big comfortable room great central location
We had a corner room which gave us a bit more space Pretty decor My only issue was with the shower I prefer a fixed shower head like in the US

Negative_Review: The cleaning wasn t always good housekeeping knocking early in the morning
Positive_Review: An excellent location big sized rooms friendly staff complementary mini bar beverages We were upgraded to a lovely spacious junior suite

Negative_Review: There was nothing not to like here
Positive_Review: A great location with friendly and helpful staff who seemed to really care that we enjoyed our visit We were given a free upgrade to a deluxe room which was a pleasant surprise and enjoyed both the restaurant and bar It is a more expensive hotel than we usually stay in but worth paying the extra for the comfort and service This trip was a special birthday celebration for me and made all the better for a great hotel

Negative_Review: I wasn t able to use the sauna when I wanted to because no one was around to turn it on
Positive_Review: Great location Half way between the tourist are and the non tourist area

Negative_Review: There was no concierge in the evenings
Positive_Review: The location was superb as it was at the center of a circle of almost all of the attractions of Vienna We could walk everywhere in just few minutes All the buzz of the city was very close by but we also enjoyed the tranquility of the street where the hotel was located The room was very clean and adequately equipped The bed and the pillows were also very good and there were choices for everyone The front desk and concierge were extremely helpful We got very good advise

Very clean hotel Very helpful staff great location Valet parking was very good especially since parking in Vienna city is very hard I liked the smoked glass door which divided the toilet from the bathroom

Negative_Review: Hot chocolate and cappuccino both very sub standard just outside in a little cafe the most outstanding coffee
Positive_Review: Perfect location breakfast buffet widespread very helpful staff
Staff was super friendly They were very busy but made us feel at home and well attended to The location is really convenient to so many good restaurants cafes and attractions

Negative_Review: I would have expected to have a tiled or Laminate floor I find carpets might look good but you never know how clean they are
Positive_Review: The bed was extremely comfortable The breakfast was very good with a wide choice for all tastes

Negative_Review: Upon the check in they did not have a family room booked by us despite sending a separate request at booking com Could be booking com messed things up They managed to find one pretty soon but in case there would not be any available our holiday would be messed up since we travelled with 4 and 6 year olds we forgot a small bag with toys in our kid s room While they were really helpful with finding it and organising for it to be sent by post to us we were surprised they charge us extra for the postage At the end of the day I ve stayed at their hotel probably 10 times in last 4 years Similar happened to us in Kempinski in Vilnius in January we forgot some books They sent them free of charge to Slovenia
Positive_Review: Location staff in bar bell boy on chech out

Negative_Review: They could have given us a free extension on at least one of our four rooms since my husband was not feeling well We were leaving on the late train to Paris We had to pay for the extra hours considering we stayed here for 7 days
Positive_Review: The room and beds were spacious and very comfortable The breakfast was so varied and delicious one will always leave satisfied

Negative_Review: Reception staff seemed too Money focused We arrived in the evening and asked if it would be possible to check out a little later than the usual noon cut off in order to allow our baby to get his mid day sleep immediately a rate card for checking out late was presented Felt a bit too aggressive in my opinion Constant small of cigarette smoke in our bathroom 5th floor it was as if someone was smoking in an adjoining bathroom and the bathroom fan was somehow sucking the smell in Parking extortionately expensive at 39 EUR day in the hotel and even more nearby
Positive_Review: Fantastic Location Fabulous Rich Breakfast amazingly available till noon

Negative_Review: on Sunday there is no restaurant in the hotel Receptionist told my that it is no 5 hotel but it is only like 5 hotel for me big difference
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: A minor negative was that we found it difficult to get a perfect temperature while sleeping tried various combinations of the air conditioner and with the opening and closing of windows Also our double bed was just two singles pushed together I much prefer when it s one big mattress no fear of being eaten by the crevasse
Positive_Review: Extremely central easy to walk to most tourist attractions on our list The Austrian National Football Team stayed in this hotel on the same weekend as us so I was pleasantly surprised to see Alaba walking through the lobby The shower was lovely as was the entire bathroom

Negative_Review: The rooms were a bit lacking on the design taste side very nice but just a notch below others the value for money makes up though Strongly recommended
Positive_Review: Location just fantastic

Negative_Review: as said the fitness room is small
Positive_Review: great location very clean very nice didn t have breakfast so can t say anything about it got a good deal by booking

Negative_Review: Breakfast and parking is priced too high
Positive_Review: The hotel is in a great centralized location The staff is friendly and helpful always welcoming The room was spacious lovely and clean

Negative_Review: Sauna cd be little bigger Ok for 3 4 people but not more Size disappointing compared to pretty big Ruheraum
Positive_Review: Coffeemaker n room Minibar included

Beautiful decor very clean and new and unique style Friendly and helpful staff They even left a bag of chocolate eggs on every door on Easter Comfy beds Excellent location centre of everything but very quiet right next to metro

Negative_Review: Its quite an expensive option for a family break
Positive_Review: Location Location Location Rooms are nice Free minibar Comfortable beds Friendly efficient staff Good buffet breakfast Nice bar and restaurant Fast free WIFI

Negative_Review: We had breakfast once but it is far overpriced There are cheaper and better quality options close to the hotel
Positive_Review: The rooms are well appointed and staff is friendly We had an initial issue with the room type we booked but that was solved quickly and our stay was very nice

Negative_Review: It was perfect as it was I would not change anything
Positive_Review: Everything was perfect from the front desk staff to the beautiful rooms We will definitely go back

Negative_Review: Staff and bar especially selections of cocktails
Positive_Review: We had 2 single beds put together to make 1 bigger bed This was great in size but the mattresses kept coming apart all the time This meant we could not cuddle together without the fear or falling in the middle

Negative_Review: shower was not quite clean and missed snacks in mini bar
Positive_Review: The service and friendliness were very good the location en room were perfect Royalty feeling

Negative_Review: un comfortable pillows they take 7 euro for each room service order I ordered ice teay told me they ll charge 7 euro 7 7
Positive_Review: nice location in the central of Vienna

Negative_Review: Internet should have high speed Minor problems with the water in bathroom which seem to be related to building The bathroom itself very modern but not functional
Positive_Review: Breakfast second to none Coffee excellent Front desk efficient internet TERRIBLE and too slow Rooms comfortable and silent Location perfect

Negative_Review: Right after i checked in i discovered the dirty carpet and a lost tablet from the previous guest maybe Even if the sheets were freshly changed the pillow and the matress had a hard sweat smell yukkkk
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Not to be able to stay longer
Positive_Review: The staff and management dealt with some random and minor inconveniences extremely professionally and ensured the stay would be absolutely remarkable

Negative_Review: The entrance and lobby could have been more opulent
Positive_Review: Fabulous location yet quiet great breakfast helpful staff basement parking if a bit expensive very good value for money

Negative_Review: The staff was indifferent and not really willing to help The room was cold about 18 19 Centigrade regardless of all our attempts to increase it with the air conditioning system breakfast is relatively expensive nobody offered us a simple heater
Positive_Review: Convenient quiet and clean room great location in close proximity to the city center and a great Central cafe

The Hotel was perfectly located in the heart of the old town The rooms were very comfortable and perfectly kept The staff was exceptionnal and we warmly recommend Michael at the front desk in particular He helped us and booked the opera tours and restaurants for us Beautiful and unforgettable stay in Vienna
Fabulous location only 5 10 min walk from Stephans Dom Great breakfast friendly staff who promptly helped out with small requests like my forgotten razor And good value for money to boot

Negative_Review: Bathroom amenities shampoo and shower gel mediocre no conditioner
Positive_Review: Location Rooms are spacious Bed is comfortable Bar ambience live music entertainment Wifi basic connection strong free Minibar complimentary non alcoholic beverages

Negative_Review: You have no special care about fidel clients
Positive_Review: The personals are very kind The breakfast is really excelent A lots of sortiments nice presentation good taste

Negative_Review: I did not like when I had an issue with the restaurant I was not heard It was handled poorly I paid almost 200 eu for a dinner and it was unsatisfactory They offered me tokens
Positive_Review: The location was amazing

Negative_Review: Our only gripe was the blocked shower drain that then overflowed everytime we had a shower Having found the front desk and porter staff rather gruff and housekeeping staff almost too intrusive with not much English we put up with it
Positive_Review: A good hotel with good location

Negative_Review: Pool is missing in the spa that is the only thing I would change if I could
Positive_Review: We were really pleased during our stay with everything On our next trip to Wien we are choosing the same hotel for sure
I was once in this hotel this was my second time and received room up grade free mini bar and free breakfast Excellent service staff room and location

Negative_Review: I was missing at least one bottle of complimentary water from the room for this price but that s just me Gym is tiny
Positive_Review: The location is the most convenient The cleanliness is perfect Staff concierge was very helpful

Negative_Review: Sauna was a bit disappointing small They advertise with 250 m2 but in reality the real sauna facility is just a sauna and steam Fitness is too warm as well with no windows
Positive_Review: Location was superb near the center Rooms were large and bed slept perfect Mohammed was also excellent helping out with car and luggage

Negative_Review: There is no swimming pool jacuzzi at the hotel we felt that if there was a swimming pool jacuzzi our stay would have been superb
Positive_Review: Wonderful hotel super location close to every thing Big comfortable room extra comfortable bad it was real important for us as my spouse suffer from his back Breakfast was the best with big variety type of food very good quality of products Stuff also was very welcoming We definitely recommend this hotel

Negative_Review: Very poor mini bar not a single alcoholic beverage Delayed check in room still not ready by 5pm Friendly but inefficient staff at reception prompting needed for print out of directions taxi fares and availability etc Drinks in spa area completely empty at 10am
Positive_Review: Excellent location Sumptuous breakfast

Negative_Review: nothing serious I could think of
Positive_Review: this hotel is extremely well managed and as a result services to the clients are top notch located in a strategic area quality and variety of food offered at breakfast is excellent

After staying in two remarkable boutique hotels the Steigenberger Hotel Herrenhof was our only traditional hotel on a recent visit to Germany and Austria We were pleasantly surprised with an upgrade The staff was good but defiantly very busy The breakfast included in our booking was nicely done The hotel is in a great location and within walking distance to many of Vienna s highlights

Negative_Review: Lovely restaurant delicious food but as we were staying for 4 nights would have appreciated a wider choice on the dinner menu
Positive_Review: Excellent staff professional friendly and anxious to please Good location
The overall experience Impressively appointed very helpful and courteous staff Couldn t be more central and the breakfast was out of this world

The location couldn t have been better being within a few 100 yards of the Hofburg Palace complex next door to the underground and no more than 10 minutes walk from Stephansdom The room was very comfortable and the staff friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: Nothing A swimming pool would have been nice The restaurant was a little pricey
Positive_Review: The hotel has a central location which means most attractions are within walking distance and the entrance to the underground is next door if you want to go further afield Nothing was too much trouble for the staff

Negative_Review: Gym and spa facilities were limited Rooms a little small However the good points far outweighed these things
Positive_Review: Location superb staff helpfulness ambience breakfast options Would definitely stay there again

Positive_Review: Beautiful old property with modern comforts Fantastic location to see Vienna s old city on foot Very friendly and effecient staff
Fantastic stay Staff even happy for me to converse in my broken German Breakfast seemed pricey but so many fantastic cafes around if you want something lighter and cheaper Would definitely go back

Negative_Review: It was a great hotel Breakfast is a bit expensive but there are plenty of alternative options nearby

Location is excellent in the center of the old town About 2 minutes from the old palace and St Michaels Church 50 meters from the historic Cafe Central which serves good food at reasonable price Breakfast at the hotel has excellent variety and quality If your room rate does not include the breakfast I suggest that you reserve for breakfast when check in to get the discount 22 euro per person without reservation vs 28 euro per person without reservation I didn t book the breakfast but we ended up having breakfast there for three days just because it was so good and so convenient
